extendedInfo.description: This very simple app helps you do what we all often fail to do, remember something. Start the app, then enter your note/reminder in the text box, then click the add button. Your memo is now placed in the notification bar of your device. It's that simple. Just tap on the notification to remove it when you don't need it anymore. Just like a sticky note or note card, or even a napkin or palm of your hand, this app is great for temporarily jotting things down so you don't forget about them. Especially things you only need to remember for a few minutes. Add more than one if you need to. No need to set times or alarms, or give your note a name to be saved forever. Quick, fast, simple, and convenient.Note, this free version contains Ads. Check out the paid version if you do not like Ads.

reviews.title: Not working at all after update
reviews.comment: It worked well before but not at all any more after the latest update on my Galaxy Note 2! Should worth no star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still great but...
reviews.comment: A reboot of phone did not save memo like update says it should
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GREAT !
reviews.comment: Thankyou. This app helped me to remember a list of things for school and for several other things. GREAT thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Instantly crashed my entire phone.
reviews.comment: Started it up and BAM. Crashed so badly I ended up having to just pull the battery.  Samsung Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application!
reviews.comment: Very handy, visual note for daily reminders without needing to add to calender for reminder
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would be great BUT !
reviews.comment: This is a great little app that would be really useful EXCEPT THAT on my Nexus tablet the notification text colour is medium grey on a background colour of light grey; result = can hardly read the text at all. I cant find a way of changing the colour of the text or the background.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but very useful
reviews.comment: This app is so simple but it is very useful for little day to day tasks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: How\'d I ever live without this app is awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Simple. Does exactly what it says and no hassle. Just what I was looking for. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User
